message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $150 for it. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of convenience and efficiency. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. Considering its value, I'm willing to offer $120 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
